snippet: More prosecutors focused on political corruption and the use of more aggressive tactics may have helped lead to recent arrests 0f lawmakers accused in bribery cases.
abstract: Increased focus by Federal prosecutors on political corruption, along with more aggressive tactics, have helped bring bribery cases against New York Sen Malcolm A Smith and Bronx Assemblyman Eric A Stevenson to court.
lead_paragraph: More prosecutors focused on political corruption and the use of more aggressive tactics may have helped lead to recent arrests 0f lawmakers accused in bribery cases.

headline.seo: Expansion of Public Corruption Unit Led to Arrests
headline.main: U.S. Attorney Added Staff to Fight Corruption
headline.print_headline: U.S. Attorney Added Staff To Confront Corruption
